name: Principle
title: A visual cheat-sheet for the 30 keyboard shortcuts found in Principle. This application is MacOS-only.

cards.title: Intro
cards.body: A visual cheat-sheet for the 30 keyboard shortcuts found in Principle. This application is MacOS-only.

cards.title: Layers
cards.body:
| Shortcut          | Action                   |
| ----------------- | ------------------------ |
| `R`               | Add rectangle            |
| `Opt` `R`         | Add rectangle as a child |
| `T`               | Add text                 |
| `Opt` `T`         | Add text as a child      |
| `A`               | Add artboard             |
| `Cmd` `G`         | Group                    |
| `Cmd` `Shift` `G` | Ungroup                  |
| `Cmd` `]`         | Bring forward            |
| `Cmd` `Shift` `]` | Bring to front           |
| `Cmd` `[`         | Send backward            |
| `Cmd` `Shift` `[` | Send to back             |

cards.title: Editing
cards.body:
| Shortcut           | Action       |
| ------------------ | ------------ |
| `(arrows)`         | Nudge        |
| `Shift` `(arrows)` | Large nudge  |
| `Cmd` `D`          | Duplicate    |
| `Cmd` `R`          | Rename layer |

cards.title: Canvas Navigation
cards.body:
| Shortcut         | Action              |
| ---------------- | ------------------- |
| `Space` `(drag)` | Pan                 |
| `Cmd` `=`        | Zoom in             |
| `Cmd` `-`        | Zoom out            |
| `Cmd` `1`        | Zoom all            |
| `Cmd` `2`        | Zoom selection      |
| `Cmd` `3`        | Center selection    |
| `Cmd` `0`        | Zoom to actual size |

cards.title: Selection
cards.body:
| Shortcut      | Action                  |
| ------------- | ----------------------- |
| `Esc`         | Select parent           |
| `Enter`       | Select child            |
| `Tab`         | Select next sibling     |
| `Shift` `Tab` | Select previous sibling |
| `Cmd` `A`     | Select all siblings     |

cards.title: Preview
cards.body:
| Shortcut         | Action                               |
| ---------------- | ------------------------------------ |
| `W`              | Rewind prototype                     |
| `Ctrl` `V`       | Start recording video                |
| `Ctrl` `Opt` `V` | Start recording video without cursor |
